<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Markdown Blog
</h1>

Simple Gatsby blog using:
* [gatsby-transformer-remark](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/packages/gatsby-transformer-remark/) to generate HTML and CSS from markdown files
* [gatsby-transformer-sharp](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/packages/gatsby-transformer-sharp/) to format images

Things I learned in this project:
* That Gatsby is awesome!
* How to set up and run a Gatsby project
* How to use the Gatsby Node API
* How to use Gatsby GraphQL data layer
* Basics of GraphQL
